Podziękowania dla następujących rezydentów za pomoc w pracy nad obecną wersją Second Life: (in progress) It is a rare mind indeed that can render the hitherto non-existent blindingly obvious. The cry 'I could have thought of that' is a very popular and misleading one, for the fact is that they didn't, and a very significant and revealing fact it is too. -- Douglas Adams
